name: Reach & Rise Mentoring
description: Reach & Rise is a national, therapeutic mentoring program that matches adult volunteer mentors (age 21+) with young people. A key feature of the program is the inclusion of parents in the mentoring process, from matching their child to an appropriate mentor, to setting goals for the mentoring relationship. Highly trained mentors meet with mentees once each week to discuss issues occurring in the youth's life while engaging in enriching activities in the community. Youth are referred from schools

howToGetIt: Click on the link below and click apply to the program you are interested in. https://www.ymcasf.org/reach-rise-mentoring
agency: YMCA of San Francisco - Urban Services
